Html:
First and foremost, thank you very much for putting this great little package together. I've been wanting a scriptable way to "clean up" my windows and return them to my preferred sizes and locations for quite a while now. Phantastisch!

 

One tiny little annoyance -- why doesn't it accept -Left 0 or -Top 0 for a WindowPosition? Those are certainly valid locations on screen. But if I use them, whichever parameter has the 0 value is simply ignored while the rest are accepted. I'm guessing there's some bizarreness with the behavior of the underlying API...?

 

Thanks again!
